entry.title: $2699 // Newly Renovated 3br Apt! Central Air & Laundry- No Fee!
entry.content:
No Fee!

Hi there :)
A Beautiful, Newly Renovated 3br / 1bath Apt in now ready for an ASAP move in!
Enjoy central air / heat, laundry in building, closets and windows in all rooms, and of course the wonderful area with a ton of coffee shops, bars, and a park near by!

Move in: Asap or by Feb 15th!

Text Courtney at show contact info to schedule a meeting!

Address: 168 Wilson Ave

FEATURES:
- Laundry in the Building
- Stainless Steel Appliances
- Video Entry System
- Central Heat and AC
- HIGH CEILINGS
- Pet Friendly!
- No Broker Fee

TRAINS:
5 Minute Walk to the Central Ave M Train
7 Minute Walk to the Dekalb L Train

Text Courtney at show contact info to schedule a meeting!

One year lease, 680+ credit and good proof of income, Guarantors accepted!

entry.title: $2395 // ***HUGE APARTMENT***SUPER LOCATION***GREAT PRICE***WONT LAST***
entry.content:
Gorgeous spacious 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment, located in the prime Bushwick area. Conveniently located close to the L/J/Z/M train lines and various bus lines for a fast and easy commute. Steps away from many bars restaurants cafe and many shops, The building is clean quiet well maintained with a great super on premises,

The apartment features, newly renovated, hardwood floors, high ceiling, large windows with lots of natural light, 2 huge bedrooms with lots of closet space, gorgeous kitchen with stainless steel appliances, nice tiled full bath, pet friendly. Balcony and much more. A MUST SEE!

For just $2400 a month, with no brokers fee,
To schedule a private viewing & for more details contact Isidore anytime show contact info
